name: Plant Warp
description:
GAME FOR GBJAM 10

FULLSCREEN

Controls(Controller also supported) DPAD - WASD or ARROW KEYS A - O or Z or N or LEFTCLICK B - P or X or M or RIGHTCLICK START - E SELECT - Q

Warp between three different plants to beat different enemies who have different weaknesses.

MUSIC: CodeManu https://opengameart.org/content/8bit-adventure
